subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: This plugin allows you to insert in a rich text box multimedia elements from the base of the document plugin.
Once installed, an integration service appears in the list when the user click the L button in the rich text editor.

subsection.name: Configuration
subsection.p: The backoffice interface defines a mapping between the objects presented in service integration and document types in the database of the document plugin.
This plugin is an extension of the document plugin.
